ai_description: A roll of pink and white cleaning cloths featuring a distinctive wavy pattern. The cloths are made from non-woven viscose rayon material. The product comes in a roll format with 30 individual cloths measuring 35cm x 25cm each. The packaging shows the OKS brand in white, purple, blue, green, and orange colors. Lifestyle images demonstrate the cloth being used for cleaning surfaces like dishes and bathroom fixtures.
